rules.text: No NSFW content. Consider this an extension of your professional network. If you wouldn't share it with your boss, you probably won't want to share it here.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia (including deadnaming or misgendering), xenophobia, ableism, or casteism will be tolerated.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

records.text: I just had $245k in student loans forgiven.
